workflow-definition.name: Multiple Approvers
workflow-definition.description: Multiple approvers that can approve publication of assets or events.

condition.name: determine-scope

notification.name: Creator Modification Notification
notification.template: Your submission was rejected by ${userName}, please modify and resubmit.

notification.name: Review Notification
notification.template: ${userName} sent you a ${entryType} for review in the workflow.

notification.name: Review Completion Notification
notification.template: Your submission has been reviewed by ${userName}. <#if taskComments?has_content> The following comments were made: "${taskComments}"</#if>.

notification.name: Escalation Review Notification
notification.template: ${userName} sent you a ${entryType} for review in the workflow.

notification.name: Escalation Review Completion Notification
notification.template: Your submission has been reviewed by ${userName}. <#if taskComments?has_content> The following comments were made: "${taskComments}"</#if>.
